(2)
You are my daughter and I have filed the following schedule as my heirs and have been the heirs of my father till today. The property in my absolute possession is the property in the Schedule, out of my love for you, for your happiness and livelihood, and with the intention of creating some tangible property for you in return for my love for you, I give you the property in the Schedule below, valued at Rs. 4,51,000/-, free of charge, and hereby release all my rights in the property, transfer all rights in your name and take possession of the property in the Schedule with all rights on this very day. By making repairs and improvements to the said property, and by paying all the revenue, panchayat taxes, etc. payable to the Sri Sarkar, you shall enjoy the said property freely, freely, and happily, with all the rights of donation, exchange, sale, and all other rights of possession and enjoyment, as you please. I hereby agree to settle all disputes, disputes, encumbrances, and other disputes arising from any cause whatsoever, whether by me or my heirs, or by you or your heirs, at my own expense and under my own responsibility, and to execute this Settlement Deed without any delay or dispute. The said property is an undisputed property, which has not been mortgaged, sold, guaranteed, loaned, seized by court or any other person, the said property is till date in our full possession with the rightful owners, the survey number, limit, door number and boundaries of the said property are correct, the said property has not had any tax arrears. If so, I tell you that I am able to pay all of them myself and I am giving this settlement deed in your name with full confidence. This is not a property assigned by the Government as per the A.P. State Act 9/77. There are no other heirs or beneficiaries to this property except me. Accordingly, a notice is filed to register your name in the accounts of the Government. .Sheet Endorsement

Declaration
This declaration is to inform that at the time of preparation of this document
Details of the property in the document, copies of 1B of the fields in the document
Documents. Tax receipts for the places/houses Link Details of the parties in the document
Photos of the parties, property details etc. are required I/We have brought all the documents and have thoroughly examined all the elements and have included them in this document and have prepared the document. No elements that should be written or included have been left out in this document. The schedule property has been physically examined and measured and the document has been prepared. I/We declare that the said property has not been sold, mortgaged, etc. to anyone else except for the sale to you, that the said property is undisputed, that there are no dues payable on the said property, and that I/We am/will be able to pay the depreciation stamp duty found in the said property in the future on the inspection of the said property by the authorities (Registration and Stamps Revenue Department). I/We have not violated the provisions of Section 22-B of the Registration Act, 1908 and I/We am/will be fully responsible for all other matters. Neither the Sub-Registrar nor the Registrar of Deeds has any connection with the said property. If it is found that the endowment, the wax board and the assignee were not made, then we will be responsible for all such things if an investigation is conducted in the future. We have read this document completely and have given our full consent in writing and read the declaration given. -

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 278 of 2026, dated 29/Jan/2026, executed by Nalli Prasad in favour of his Daughter, Geddada Prasanthi, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 96.8 Sq. Yds, located near by house number 1-45, comprised in survey number 168/5, situated in Ramarajulanka Revenue Village, Gram Panchayt and Malikipuram Mandal, within the District of Konasema, registered at sub-registrar office Mamidikuduru(423), is bounded as follows: North by: House of Nalli Chinnibabu South by: Site of Nalli Dharmaraju East by: House of Nalli Yesuratnam West by: Joint way and site of Palaparthi Rajeswari
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note:: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
